attributes.action: proclaim One Hundred Acre Wood to be a Tiggerist Republic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a long and bitter struggle against the evil Poohkind we hereby request the Prime Minister proclaim One Hundred Acre Wood to be a Tiggerist Republic and that Comrade Tiggoui be offered a perminat seat on the UN; replacing the USA.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
